description:
Rob Yaeger"The Blitz"Ht: 6'2" WT: 165lbs Season W/L record ( 0-0)Clayton Kent"The Pile-Driver"Ht: 6'0" WT: 170lbsSeason W/L record (0-1)
Clayton Kent may have lost his first fight on NK but that only made him hungrier for victory. The only thing standing in his way is Rob Yaeger, a ripped stud representing New York. Rob mentions that he hasn't been fucked since 2004, making him even more determined to win. Quickly Clayton gains control and works his opponent, smothering him with his hairy, sweaty body. Rob pulls on Clayton's balls till he can escape his grasp, and catches him in a full nelson. Rob is ready to show Clayton he's a great fighter and an even better fucker, but Clayton has plans to give his opponent his "Golden Gate Cock" and have him crawl back to New York.
title: Clayton "Pile-Driver" Kent vs Rob "The Blitz" Yaeger
